summary: A grandfather, a priest, and a police officer investigate the case of a kidnapped child.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Vidya Balan|Prakash Belawadi|Mukesh Chhabra|Sabyasachi Chakrabarty|Paritosh Sand|Aarnaa Sharma|Tota Roy Chowdhury|Suneel Sinha|Padmavati Rao|Deblina Chakraborty|Anupam Bhattacharya|Ardhendu Banerjee|Sumit Samaddar|Ricky Patel|Madhumita Sen|Somnath Mondal|Sujata Ghosh|Abhik Sarkar|Ravindranath|Anando Mukherjee|Indu Bhushan Roy|Sajal Chatterjee|Manab Chaudhari|Dibakar Baruri|Sukomol Chatterjee|Rahul Lahiri
title: Te3n
